item.title: US prosecutors to seek death penalty for Luigi Mangione
item.description: The 26-year-old is accused of shooting dead healthcare CEO Brian Thompson outside a Manhattan hotel.

item.title: Tourists and residents evacuated as volcano erupts in Iceland
item.description: The Blue Lagoon and the town of Grindavik were ordered to evacuate after earthquakes hit the area.

item.title: France's far right calls for Paris rally in support of Le Pen
item.description: Marine Le Pen has said a "nuclear bomb" was used against her party to stop it getting into power.

item.title: Putin begins biggest Russian military call-up in years
item.description: Russia calls up 160,000 men aged 18-30 as it moves to expand the size of its military.

item.title: Outrage in Somalia after man says he married missing eight-year-old
item.description: Her family had not seen her for six months before she was found with a man claiming to be her husband.
